DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate gastro-intestinal tolerability ( nausea , vomit , diarrhoea , abdominal discomfort , abdominal pain ) vortioxetine follow single oral dos three modified-release ( MR ) capsule differently coat multiple particle compare one immediate-release ( IR ) tablet .

DOC.criteria: Healthy woman ≥18 ≤45 year age body mass index ( BMI ) > 18.5 < 30.0 kg/m2 . Women childbearing potential confirm nonpregnant nonlactating status . Other protocoldefined Inclusion Exclusion Criteria may apply .
